title: Index of Production of Textiles for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1944-1953 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1919-1952 (3)--Original Data, 1947-1957 This Index Is Roughly Comparable To The Previous Index. Source: Federal Reserve Bulletin, December 1953 And Subsequent Issues.

This NBER data series m01201c appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01201c
